name: Tactical Ghosts: The Impification
description:
Game created for the Ludum Dare 50 Gamejam

Tactical Ghosts: The Impification

Genre: Tactical, Reaction time, Puzzle

 Playtime: Infinite, try to beat your high score. +/- 10 min to unlock all content.

Description:

Try to delay the imp invasion of your majestic ghost empire. Use your brain and reflex to solve short puzzles and fights. The unique combination of chess and fantasy. Great game for both people who have never played chess, and everyone else!

Second author:  https://adriannowak97.itch.io
